name: BrainImagingModalityVS
title: Brain Imaging Modality ValueSet
description: Defines the SNOMED CT codes for individual brain imaging modalities performed as procedures.

concept.display: Computed tomography of brain without radiopaque contrast (procedure)
Computed tomography angiography of intracranial artery with contrast (procedure)
Magnetic resonance imaging of brain with fluid attenuated inversion recovery sequence (procedure)
Magnetic resonance imaging cerebral perfusion study (procedure)
Magnetic resonance angiography of intracranial structure (procedure)
